trans-unit.source: Represents the context for one or more retries of a request made against the Windows Azure storage services, including the number of retries made for the request, the results of the last request, and the storage location and location mode for subsequent retries.
trans-unit.target: Represents the context for one or more retries of a request made against the Windows Azure storage services, including the number of retries made for the request, the results of the last request, and the storage location and location mode for subsequent retries.
